name: Watermelon Slingshot
description:
Sling those melons!

Launch watermelons at crabs on the beach in this 3-player (local-multiplayer), 1-button-per-player arcade/action game.

Hold button to fire, release to launch. But don't pull too hard or...WATERMELON FAIL!

P1 - Joystick 1 or Left Mouse or Z

P2 - Joystick 2 or Right Mouse or Space bar

P3 - Joystick 3 or Middle Mouse or Up arrow

Secret controls:

G - generate new beach

Q - restart game

If you enjoy this game, let me know!

////////

Originally created for 3-button, 3-color jam theme: One More Time

Credits:

Daniel Chamberlin - Stuff

Sounds from freesound.org. Crab model from cgtrader.com.
